## WorkspaceSvg.hideComponents() method

Hide any autohideable components (like flyout, trashcan, and any user-registered components).

**Signature:**

```typescript
hideComponents(onlyClosePopups?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  onlyClosePopups | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether only popups should be closed. Defaults to false. |

**Returns:**

void
